delete-from-category:
Used as edit summary. Parameters:
* %(page)s - category name
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Protect-category}}
delete-from-file: Edit summary when the bot deletes a list of pages.
delete-images:
Used as edit summary. Parameters:
* %(page)s - page name
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Protect-images}}
delete-linked-pages:
Edit summary when the bot deletes all pages linked from a page.

Link is all the links on a page. So if your page content was <nowiki>[[Page1]] [[Page2]]</nowiki>, it would use those two pages.

Parameters:
* %(page)s - page name
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Protect-links}}
delete-referring-pages:
Edit summary when the bot deletes all pages referring from a page.

Refer is basically [[Special:WhatLinksHere]], or all the pages that link to the page provided.

Parameters:
* %(page)s - page name
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Protect-ref}}
